001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.HistoryLogProps;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006
007import java.util.HashSet;
008import java.util.Set;
009import java.util.TreeSet;
010
011@HistoryLogProps(
012    opCode = 280,
013    usedByAndroid = true
014)
015public class BolusDeliveryHistoryLog extends HistoryLog {
016    
017    private int bolusID;
018    private int bolusDeliveryStatus;
019    private int bolusTypeBitmask;
020    private int bolusSource;
021    private int reserved;
022    private int requestedNow;
023    private int requestedLater;
024    private int correction;
025    private int extendedDurationRequested;
026    private int deliveredTotal;
027    
028    public BolusDeliveryHistoryLog() {}
029    
030    public BolusDeliveryHistoryLog(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, int bolusID, int bolusDeliveryStatus, Set<BolusType> bolusTypes, BolusSource bolusSource, int reserved, int requestedNow, int requestedLater, int correction, int extendedDurationRequested, int deliveredTotal) {
031        this.cargo = buildCargo(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum, bolusID, bolusDeliveryStatus, BolusType.toBitmask(bolusTypes.toArray(new BolusType[]{})), bolusSource.id(), reserved, requestedNow, requestedLater, correction, extendedDurationRequested, deliveredTotal);
032        this.pumpTimeSec = pumpTimeSec;
033        this.sequenceNum = sequenceNum;
034        this.bolusID = bolusID;
035        this.bolusDeliveryStatus = bolusDeliveryStatus;
036        this.bolusTypeBitmask = BolusType.toBitmask(bolusTypes.toArray(new BolusType[]{}));
037        this.bolusSource = bolusSource.id();
038        this.reserved = reserved;
039        this.requestedNow = requestedNow;
040        this.requestedLater = requestedLater;
041        this.correction = correction;
042        this.extendedDurationRequested = extendedDurationRequested;
043        this.deliveredTotal = deliveredTotal;
044        
045    }
046
047    public int typeId() {
048        return 280;
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * <table border="1">
053     * <caption>Parsed fields for BolusDeliveryHistoryLog:</caption>
054     * <tr><td><code>bolusID</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 10)</code></td></tr>
055     * <tr><td><code>bolusDeliveryStatus</code></td><td><code>raw[12]</code></td></tr>
056     * <tr><td><code>bolusTypeBitmask</code></td><td><code>raw[13]</code></td></tr>
057     * <tr><td><code>bolusSource</code></td><td><code>raw[14]</code></td></tr>
058     * <tr><td><code>reserved</code></td><td><code>raw[15]</code></td></tr>
059     * <tr><td><code>requestedNow</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 16)</code></td></tr>
060     * <tr><td><code>requestedLater</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 18)</code></td></tr>
061     * <tr><td><code>correction</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 20)</code></td></tr>
062     * <tr><td><code>extendedDurationRequested</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 22)</code></td></tr>
063     * <tr><td><code>deliveredTotal</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 24)</code></td></tr>
064     * </table>
065     */
066    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
067        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == 26);
068        this.cargo = raw;
069        parseBase(raw);
070        this.bolusID = Bytes.readShort(raw, 10);
071        this.bolusDeliveryStatus = raw[12];
072        this.bolusTypeBitmask = raw[13];
073        this.bolusSource = raw[14];
074        this.reserved = raw[15];
075        this.requestedNow = Bytes.readShort(raw, 16);
076        this.requestedLater = Bytes.readShort(raw, 18);
077        this.correction = Bytes.readShort(raw, 20);
078        this.extendedDurationRequested = Bytes.readShort(raw, 22);
079        this.deliveredTotal = Bytes.readShort(raw, 24);
080    }
081
082    
083    /**
084     * <table border="1">
085     * <caption>Byte layout for BolusDeliveryHistoryLog.buildCargo(...):</caption>
086     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
087     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>new byte[]{24} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
088     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>new byte[]{1} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
089     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSec) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
090     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSec) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSec) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSec) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(sequenceNum) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint32(sequenceNum) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>toUint32(sequenceNum) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>9</td><td><code>toUint32(sequenceNum) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>10</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusID) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>11</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusID) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
099     * <tr><td>12</td><td><code>(byte) bolusDeliveryStatus</code></td></tr>
100     * <tr><td>13</td><td><code>(byte) bolusType</code></td></tr>
101     * <tr><td>14</td><td><code>(byte) bolusSource</code></td></tr>
102     * <tr><td>15</td><td><code>(byte) reserved</code></td></tr>
103     * <tr><td>16</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(requestedNow) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
104     * <tr><td>17</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(requestedNow) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
105     * <tr><td>18</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(requestedLater) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
106     * <tr><td>19</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(requestedLater) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
107     * <tr><td>20</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(correction) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
108     * <tr><td>21</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(correction) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
109     * <tr><td>22</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(extendedDurationRequested) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
110     * <tr><td>23</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(extendedDurationRequested) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
111     * <tr><td>24</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(deliveredTotal) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
112     * <tr><td>25</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(deliveredTotal) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
113     * </table>
114     */
115    public static byte[] buildCargo(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, int bolusID, int bolusDeliveryStatus, int bolusType, int bolusSource, int reserved, int requestedNow, int requestedLater, int correction, int extendedDurationRequested, int deliveredTotal) {
116        return Bytes.combine(
117            new byte[]{24, 1}, // 280 across 2 bytes
118            Bytes.toUint32(pumpTimeSec),
119            Bytes.toUint32(sequenceNum),
120            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusID), 
121            new byte[]{ (byte) bolusDeliveryStatus }, 
122            new byte[]{ (byte) bolusType }, 
123            new byte[]{ (byte) bolusSource }, 
124            new byte[]{ (byte) reserved },
125            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(requestedNow),
126            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(requestedLater), 
127            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(correction), 
128            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(extendedDurationRequested), 
129            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(deliveredTotal));
130    }
131    
132    public int getBolusID() {
133        return bolusID;
134    }
135    public int getBolusDeliveryStatus() {
136        return bolusDeliveryStatus;
137    }
138    public int getBolusTypeBitmask() {
139        return bolusTypeBitmask;
140    }
141    public int getBolusSourceId() {
142        return bolusSource;
143    }
144    public int getReserved() {
145        return reserved;
146    }
147    public int getRequestedNow() {
148        return requestedNow;
149    }
150    public int getRequestedLater() {
151        return requestedLater;
152    }
153    public int getCorrection() {
154        return correction;
155    }
156    public int getExtendedDurationRequested() {
157        return extendedDurationRequested;
158    }
159    public int getDeliveredTotal() {
160        return deliveredTotal;
161    }
162
163    public BolusSource getBolusSource() {
164        return BolusSource.fromId(bolusSource);
165    }
166
167    public enum BolusSource {
168        QUICK_BOLUS(0),
169        GUI(1),
170        CONTROL_IQ_AUTO_BOLUS(7),
171        BLUETOOTH_REMOTE_BOLUS(8),
172
173        ;
174        private int id;
175        BolusSource(int id) {
176            this.id = id;
177        }
178        public int id() {
179            return id;
180        }
181        public static BolusSource fromId(int id) {
182            for (BolusSource b : values()) {
183                if (b.id == id) return b;
184            }
185            return null;
186        }
187    }
188
189    public Set<BolusType> getBolusTypes() {
190        return BolusType.fromBitmask(getBolusTypeBitmask());
191    }
192
193    public enum BolusType {
194        FOOD1(1), // used when there is carbs
195        CORRECTION(2), // used when there is a correction amount
196        EXTENDED(4),
197        FOOD2(8), // used when there is no carbs and just a distinct bolus amount
198        ;
199        private int mask;
200        BolusType(int mask) {
201            this.mask = mask;
202        }
203        public int mask() {
204            return mask;
205        }
206        public static Set<BolusType> fromBitmask(int bitmask) {
207            Set<BolusType> ret = new TreeSet<>();
208            for (BolusType b : values()) {
209                if ((bitmask & b.mask()) != 0) {
210                    ret.add(b);
211                }
212            }
213            return ret;
214        }
215        public static int toBitmask(BolusType ...types) {
216            int bitmask = 0;
217            for (BolusType b : types) {
218                bitmask |= b.mask();
219            }
220            return bitmask;
221        }
222    }
223    
224}
